resources.string: “Once you choose hope, anything’s possible.”\n - Christopher Reeve
“Authenticity is an act of social justice.” \n - Kierra C.T. Banks
“I aspire to be a woman that inspires by being.”\n - Kierra C.T. Banks
"The purpose of our lives is to be happy."\n — Dalai Lama
"Get busy living or get busy dying."\n — Stephen King
